tag_list: lad-stallion, lefthome, lefthouse, haxsaw-and-dugin, rofrantic, gene-wilder
overview:
Brian McGuire is a writer, director, actor, and music maker and he also is the dreamer of the dream.

Brian is also one of the founders of LeftHouse Recordings which is currently working under the name LeftHome Recordings. The record label has been alive since 2005.

As a filmmaker Brian has written and directed 5 feature films.
